price: (Yaitu) hari (ketika) mereka keluar (dari kubur); tiada suatu pun dari keadaan mereka yang tersembunyi bagi Allah.  (Lalu, Allah berfirman), "Kepunyaan siapakah kerajaan pada hari ini?" Kepunyaan Allah Yang Maha Esa lagi Maha Mengalahkan.
arabic: يَوۡمَ هُم بَٰرِزُونَۖ لَا يَخۡفَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ مِنۡهُمۡ شَيۡءٞۚ لِّمَنِ ٱلۡمُلۡكُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡوَٰحِدِ ٱلۡقَهَّارِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma hum bārizūna lā yakhfā ʿalā al-lahi min'hum shayon limani al-mul'ku al-yawma lillahi al-wāḥidi al-qahāri
